detect 0.5-0

  • Changelog

Bird point count data from Alberta's Oil Sands region

josm.Rd

Data set used in Mahon et al. 2016 and Mahon et al. 2019.

Usage

data("josm")

Format

A list with elements surveys, species, and counts.

Source

Mahon et al. 2016 and Mahon et al. 2019.

References

Mahon, C. L., Holloway, G., Solymos, P., Cumming, S. G., Bayne, E. M., Schmiegelow, F. K. A., Song, S. J., 2016. Community structure and niche characteristics of upland and lowland western boreal birds at multiple spatial scales Forest Ecology and Management 361:99-116. <doi:10.1016/j.foreco.2015.11.007>

Mahon, C. L., Holloway, G., Bayne, E. M., Toms, J. D., 2019. Additive and interactive cumulative effects on boreal landbirds: winners and losers in a multi-stressor landscape Ecological Applications 29:e01895. <doi:10.1002/eap.1895>

Examples

data(josm)
str(josm)
